channel.title: Question
channel.description: When lothy made new rules for advertisment section does that mean i cant advertise my hamachi server,if i cant why not.this is the best site ever.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

lol u dont need to port forward if u dont use a router…

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

No HAM? Lmao , going to talk with Lothy about this

Posted this:

Lothy ,

As you can now dont use Hamachi on advertise section many people will complain and moan about it , I dont see the point why not? They dont have problems with HAM . If they want to port forward we only get much spam in Help/Devlopment section ,

Please i request to take away that rule

Thanks for your time ,

Zenzie

-------------------* EDIT ------------------*-

LeScape Pk:

so are they locking for hamachi or not? because 95% of the adv section is hamachi…because theres nowhere else to advertise, hamachi people cant use the server advertisement, and i think they mean something else because mine hasnt been locked yet, and niether has anyone elses’ who uses hamachi…i hope they mean something else because i don’t have a router

You dont need a router to port forward

Read full topic
